name: .APPLESCRIPT File Extension
summary: Learn about .APPLESCRIPT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Script written in AppleScript, an automation and scripting language used by Macintosh computers; can be edited or automatically generated using the Apple Script Editor; may also be run within the Script Editor program.

content: AppleScript files typically use .SCPT as the default extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
